name: Asterism Completion
description:
HARAP KLIK SPACE DI AWAL BERKALI KALI AGAR GAME BERJALAN

As for now, updates are temporarily disabled during the voting time. You can play the fixed version on Asterism Completion (Updated) by Cemong Studio (itch.io)

An Escape Room, Side Scroll, Mystery Puzzle game with only approximately 2 minutes to finish. Or is it?!

Find out by yourself with the challenging puzzles to solve and discover the twist!

Game by Sate Padang A reimagined story about Ulysses and the Sirens, taking you to an alternate world of outer space! Team
  • Arya Salsabila - Pixel Artist & UI/UX (naraetos)
  • Safira Feybri - Character Artist (lapis.lazulite)
  • Haikal Danung - Programmer (hkldtrinanda)
  • Ahmad Shahal - Programmer
  • Jasmine Ardinda - Game Designer
  • Herlangga Satria - Sound Artist
Button
  • W, A, S, D - Walk
  • E - Grab Item
  • Space - Next Dialogue
  • ESC - Back
